医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
初生成年人的疼痛和焦虑与大量饮酒有关经历过疼痛的新兴成年人（18 至 24 岁）更有可能出现酗酒等高风险饮酒模式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Pain-and-anxiety-linked-to-heavy-episodic-drinking-in-emerging-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Pain-and-anxiety-linked-to-heavy-episodic-drinking-in-emerging-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e48f3723-cca2-4996-8660-b8c096adcf88 Tue, 04 Jul 2023 22:57:04 -0400 Pain and anxiety linked to heavy episodic drinking in emerging adults
患有 COVID-19 急性后遗症的女性患高血压的风险可能更大COVID-19 急性后后遗症 (PASC)，通俗地称为长期 COVID-19 或长期 COVID，是指某人从急性 COVID-19 中恢复，但在数月后表现出一系列症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Women-with-post-acute-sequelae-of-COVID-19-could-be-at-greater-risk-of-developmenting-hypertension.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Women-with-post-acute-sequelae-of-COVID-19-could-be-at-greater-risk-of-developmenting-hypertension.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9bf306fe-f8a6-4d65-ba99-f24ffc68d862 Tue, 04 Jul 2023 22:53:54 -0400 Women with post-acute sequelae of COVID-19 could be at greater risk of developing hypertension
科学家鉴定出可预测 1 型糖尿病的血液蛋白科学家们在症状出现前几个月预测谁会患上 1 型糖尿病方面迈出了重要一步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Scientists-identify-blood- Proteins-that-may-predict-Type-1-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Scientists-identify-blood- Proteins-that-may-predict-Type-1-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98614727-c133-4d11-a6c3-46be4336601b Tue, 04 Jul 2023 22:49:45 -0400 Scientists identify blood proteins that may predict Type 1 diabetes
关于子宫内膜异位症确诊前活产率的研究报告根据今天（周三）在世界领先的生殖医学期刊之一《人类生殖》上发表的新研究，子宫内膜异位症与明确手术诊断前几年的生育能力下降有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Study-reports-on-live-birth-rates-before-a-definitive-diagnosis-of-endometriosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Study-reports-on-live-birth-rates-before-a-definitive-diagnosis-of-endometriosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b7621bab-b483-494d-82a9-e5953025b95e Tue, 04 Jul 2023 22:45:54 -0400 Study reports on live birth rates before a definitive diagnosis of endometriosis
遗传基因与肠道憩室病的高风险相关昆士兰大学的研究人员利用遗传学揭示，罹患常见且有时致命的肠道疾病的大部分风险是遗传的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Inherited-genes-linked-to-higher-risk-for-divertillary-disease-of-intestine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Inherited-genes-linked-to-higher-risk-for-divertillary-disease-of-intestine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc6ea3c3-7aa6-4501-a1c5-89b7d7c4c696 Tue, 04 Jul 2023 22:43:08 -0400 Inherited genes linked to higher risk for diverticular disease of intestine
气候变化对新南威尔士州北部健康和医疗保健的影响：需要采取紧急行动《国际环境研究与公共卫生杂志》上发表的一篇系统综述描述了气候变化对澳大利亚新南威尔士州北部健康和卫生服务的影响。该地区被认为是澳大利亚洪水和丛林大火的“热点”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Climate-changes-impact-on-health-and-healthcare-in-Northern-NSW-Urgent-action-needed.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Climate-changes-impact-on-health-and-healthcare-in-Northern-NSW-Urgent-action-needed.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9055f75c-54bb-49e6-a267-903c76b02bcb Tue, 04 Jul 2023 22:33:00 -0400 Climate change's impact on health and healthcare in Northern NSW: Urgent action needed
补充维生素 D 可降低老年人发生重大心血管事件的风险研究调查了补充维生素 D 对老年人主要心血管事件发生率的影响。它检查每月服用维生素 D 是否可以改变心脏相关问题的发生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Vitamin-D-supplementation-reduces-risk-of-major-cardioangio-events-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Vitamin-D-supplementation-reduces-risk-of-major-cardioangio-events-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96652b9d-071f-4dfc-842f-58e9a68e8188 Tue, 04 Jul 2023 21:59:00 -0400 Vitamin D supplementation reduces risk of major cardiovascular events in older adults
为风湿病治疗增添香料：研究探讨草药和香料在改善患者病情中的作用研究探索了草药和香料在风湿性疾病中的潜在益处，强调了它们的生物活性化合物和药用特性。它提供了对其作用机制的最新回顾，并总结了类风湿关节炎、骨关节炎和纤维肌痛的人体研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Spicing-up-rheumatic-disease-treatment-Study-explores-role-of-herbs-and-spices-in-improving-病人-condition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Spicing-up-rheumatic-disease-treatment-Study-explores-role-of-herbs-and-spices-in-improving-病人-condition.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fa6824d6-69fa-4904-8d8f-41c8d8f4a666 Tue, 04 Jul 2023 21:42:00 -0400 Spicing up rheumatic disease treatment: Study explores role of herbs and spices in improving patients' condition
评估阿尔茨海默病抗淀粉样蛋白免疫疗法的关键问题阿尔茨海默病的抗淀粉样蛋白免疫疗法需要对其疗效、安全性和成本效益进行彻底评估。有关统计分析、治疗效果和病程改变的关键问题指导对这些药物的循证考虑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Critical-questions-raised-for-evaluation-of-anti-amyloid-immunotherapies-in-Alzheimers-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Critical-questions-raised-for-evaluation-of-anti-amyloid-immunotherapies-in-Alzheimers-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2758bc35-3615-4644-b9ed-066beee45024 Tue, 04 Jul 2023 21:15:00 -0400 Critical questions raised for evaluation of anti-amyloid immunotherapies in Alzheimer's treatment
研究显示英国沿海城镇自闭症发病率上升，挑战性别刻板印象研究调查了过去二十年来贫困沿海社区自闭症谱系障碍 (ASD) 诊断的增加情况。它强调了时间趋势对诊断中性别差异的影响，以及需要进一步调查以了解潜在因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Study-reveals-rising-autism-rates-in-English-coastal-town-challenges-gender-stereotypes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230704/Study-reveals-rising-autism-rates-in-English-coastal-town-challenges-gender-stereotypes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79ef7cb7-4e65-46c4-ba27-dfecbed24f08 Tue, 04 Jul 2023 21:07:00 -0400 Study reveals rising autism rates in English coastal town, challenges gender stereotypes
